CLASS&Barbarian: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage
CLASS&Bard: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation
CLASS&Cleric: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power
CLASS&Druid: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature — moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning — and adopting animal forms
CLASS&Fighter: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor
CLASS&Monk: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection
CLASS&Paladin: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath
CLASS&Ranger: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization
CLASS&Rogue: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies
CLASS&Sorcerer: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline
CLASS&Warlock: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity
CLASS&Wizard: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality
